long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yiddish24 Music Streamer

Experience seamless music streaming with the Yiddish24 Music Streamer extension. This extension automatically selects and plays the correct music stream based on the current date, ensuring you always have the right tunes for the day.

Features:

Automatically updates the music stream URL at midnight based on the date.
Reopens the streaming tab if itâ€™s accidentally closed.
Ensures only one streaming tab is open at any given time.
Automatically reloads the player if it stops playing for any reason.
Simple and intuitive design for a hassle-free streaming experience.
Stay connected with your favorite music effortlessly with Yiddish24 Music Streamer!
